Text:
(My original plan, for a variety of reasons, was to
watch the birth of Rose the Monarch from off in the
distance, but then there was this huge monster
outbreak.)
(No biggie, though. I get what's going on.)

(This is the forces of darkness working to hinder the
monarch. When the redheaded dude summoned the
bat, it was to stop her from coming into her own.)

Having regenerated one of its wings, the bat targets
Cid in a furious rage.
Man, this fantasy world doesn't mess around.
Even their bats are ginormous.
Hmm. A natural disaster.
OP magic, OP power... I swear, beasts have it all.
—Huh?
Oh.
My bangs got singed.

In times like these, you should confront things
head-on and then let things play out.
Didn't they teach that in class?

In an instant, Cid has laid out finely woven threads
of magic across the sky.
GYAAAAAA!
The skies are under my dominion.
Beast, engrave that knowledge in your flesh!

A mere puppet of experimental subjects like you has
no say in the matter. You and Oriana will soon be
destroyed.
By Ragnarok, ruler of the Fourth Realm—
*gasp*
The Demon King's...arm?
GYAAAAAA!
What—
That's absurd!

Impossible! This is Ragnarok we're talking about...
The most powerful magic entity in recorded history!
How could this...happen?! It's simply not possible!

I will not stand for it! Ragnarok is a living wonder!
A priceless treasure from another dimension!

He was meant to be a vessel capable of becoming a
new substrate! It was entirely feasible! My theory
was achievable!
How pitiful.

If you could only grasp a fraction of Shadow Wisdom,
things wouldn't have ended up like this.
Report.

The surrounding magical beasts have all been
exterminated.
Well done.
Let's split up the troops as planned.

Monitor the Black Rose and assess the damage in the
surrounding area.

The movements of the rebel forces are of particular
concern.
Nghh!

Hah! This must be a dream stemming from my
exhaustion.

It appears I'm stressed out from dealing with these
barbarians!
Otherwise, I would never have such a nightmare!

It was fun like a boss fight in a video game, but
the main character and some of the interesting
side characters were sorta left out...

Plus, it could've at least tied in better with the
main plot...
And what's the deal with reusing special effects...?
Hrraaaaahhh!!!
*sigh*
Typical fail.
